{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetSpecies}} '''A_SetSpecies''' (str ''species'' [, int ''ptr''])
===Parameters=== * ''species'': Changes the calling actor's (or the pointed to actor's) [[Actor_properties#Species|species]] to the defined parameter. Use "None" to remove it from all species and subject it to infighting. * ''pointer'': The [[Actor Pointers|pointed actor]] to change instead of itself.
